messages.title: I'M BACKING STEEN
messages.content: Steen Parish is an outstanding candidate for West, an experienced campaigner on issues like the new coal plant planned for Hunterston. He is a committed supporter of public services, not the cuts agenda. He can be relied upon to work hard to deliver affordable homes, and keep your environment and education system high with his promotion of green jobs. Your vote will help him oppose tuition fees and urge you to back him with your second vote. Elect Steen as your MSP.

messages.title: THE GREEN PARTY WILL HOLD THE BALANCE OF POWER AFTER THE HOLYROOD ELECTION
messages.content: According to a shock new poll.

messages.title: IT ONLY TAKES AROUND 6%
messages.content: Of 2nd votes to elect Steen Parish as your Green MSP for West.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes tuition fees, aims to keep university education free.
Committed to supporting public services over cuts agenda.
Works hard to deliver affordable homes.
Wants to keep environment preserved and promote green jobs.
Against the new coal plant planned for Hunterston.
Promote fairer taxes to invest in public services.

issues.environment: Opposes new coal plant, promotes green jobs, secured millions for insulation and renewables.

housing.content: Works hard to deliver affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: An experienced campaigner on issues like the new coal plant planned for Hunterston.

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaigning on environmental issues, supporting public services, and promoting green jobs

endorsements.endorsement: Supports Steen Parish as the candidate for West.

quotes.text: The Green party will hold the balance of power after the Holyrood election, according to a shock new poll.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet promotes the strategic use of the second vote to elect Steen Parish as the Green MSP for West.
